THE FINAL COUNTDOWN
Monday 5 May | Mandarin Oriental, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
Hello Hagop,

Time is running out to register for the CIPS MENA Procurement & Supply Chain Futures Forum 2025! 

This is your gateway into the heart of procurement and supply chain across the region. Be amongst 3,000+ leaders within the profession, network with key decision-makers, witness excellence and history in the making during the awards ceremony, hear from over 40+ international speakers and explore exclusive offerings on our exhibition floor.

Join us on Monday 5th May 2025 | Conference: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM | Awards: 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/prFhC4YN0F954XZiVtyc42arj?domain=app.cipscomms.org> , Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/prFhC4YN0F954XZiVtyc42arj?domain=app.cipscomms.org>

chunks.text:
Join us on Monday 5th May 2025 | Conference: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM | Awards: 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/prFhC4YN0F954XZiVtyc42arj?domain=app.cipscomms.org> , Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/prFhC4YN0F954XZiVtyc42arj?domain=app.cipscomms.org> 

*The conference is free to attend and the awards dinner is a paid event. You will receive your digital QR code which will allow you access before the day of the event. Please check your junk email.
 
REGISTER NOW <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/JQXIC51OGTp9kByU8umckuF8g?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  
 
Still not convinced? 

Here's a glimpse of some of the speakers that you could meet:
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/FTfFC6zPJS0mL5RIBC6c5hW_X?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  	
- Ayman A. Bagawi - Supply Chain & Procurement Vice President, The Royal Commission for AlUla
- Cassie Mackie - Vice President Procurement & Supply Chain, Etihad Airways
- Nourah AlZwaidy - Supply Chain Development Director, ROSHN
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/c1_lC7WQKcVNGDri2FvcoTJmF?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  	
- Turki Al Johani - Chief Procurement Officer, Tasnee
- Ben Farrell - CEO, CIPS
- Cory Thwaites - Senior Executive Vice President - Group Procurement, QNB
 
VIEW THE SPEAKERS <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/4PaGC8BRLCPqNomCEHxcytS3f?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  
 
Join us for one of the biggest and most influential CIPS event ever! Tickets are limited so claim your place now to avoid missing out.
